titleStmt.title: A true & exact relation of the several passages at the siege of Manchester between the Lo. Strange his forces and the towne vvherein is evidently seene the wonderfull mercy of God in their deliverance / written by one that was an eie-witnese ... ; also a protestation of Master Hotham and divers other knights and gentlemen against the 14 articles of pacification and neutrality.
titleStmt.author: One that was an eie-witnesse.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
